General.Name: Chongqing Yukaifa Co Ltd
General.Description: Chongqing Yukaifa Co., Ltd engages in the development and sale of real estate properties in China. It offers conferences and exhibitions, house leasing, and property management services, as well as involved in the sale of commercial housing and operating tunnel. The company was founded in 1978 and is based in Chongqing, China. Chongqing Yukaifa Co., Ltd operates as a subsidiary of Chongqing urban construction investment (Group) limited.

2.Name: Mr. Yongbin  Xie
2.Title: Deputy GM, Gen. Council & Sec. of the Board
